name: @naverpay/commithelper-go
description: A CLI tool to assist with commit messages based on branch names and configuration.

scripts.build:windows: GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 go build -o bin/commithelper-go-windows-amd64.exe main.go
scripts.build:macos:amd64: GOOS=darwin GOARCH=amd64 go build -o bin/commithelper-go-darwin-amd64 main.go
scripts.build:macos:arm64: GOOS=darwin GOARCH=arm64 go build -o bin/commithelper-go-darwin-arm64 main.go
scripts.build:linux: GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build -o bin/commithelper-go-linux-amd64 main.go
scripts.build: pnpm build:default && pnpm build:windows && pnpm build:macos:amd64 && pnpm build:macos:arm64 && pnpm build:linux
